annotations.description: A refreshing herbal porch sipper from 1800's England The Pimm's Cup was created by James Pimm for his London Oyster Bar which he opened in 1823, right across...
annotations.title: Pimm's Cup From Employees Only

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Pimm's #1
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Cointreau
10 Mint Leaves
3 Cucumber Slices 

Shake and strain into large cup with ice. 
Top Ginger Ale (approx. 1oz or 30ml) 
Mint Sprig, Sliced Cucumber Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ma5fHZLfkGM
title: Pimm's Cup
